briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Alisporivir Triple Therapy in Chronic Hepatitis C Genotype 1 Treatment-naïve Participants
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Trial of the Efficacy and Safety of DEB025/Alisporivir in Combination With Peg-IFNα2a and Ribavirin in Hepatitis C Genotype 1 Treatment-naïve Patients
summary: This study will assess the safety and efficacy of alisporivir (ALV; DEB025) triple therapy \[i.e., when added to peginterferon alfa-2a (PEG) and ribavirin (RBV)\] to optimize treatment in treatment-naïve participants with hepatitis C virus (HCV) genotype 1 (GT1)

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Achieved Sustained Virologic Response (SVR) 12 Weeks After the End of Treatment (SVR12)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 12 weeks after the end of treatment
